original_text: Then Jesus brought a child to stand in the middle of them all. He took hold of the child and he said to the disciples,
korean_text: 어린 아이 하나를 데려다가 그들 가운데 세우시고 안으시며 제자들에게 이르시되

sentences.original_text: to stand in the middle of them all
He took hold of the child
and he said to the disciples
